insert into member_tbl(m_id, m_pw, m_number, m_name, m_birth, m_gender, m_email, m_email_marketing, m_phone) values(#{m_Id}, #{m_Pw}, #{m_Number}, #{m_Name}, #{m_Birth}, #{m_Gender}, #{m_Email}, #{m_Email_Marketing}, #{m_Phone})

SELECT NVL(count(1), 0) FROM ( SELECT list.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( select m_id, m_name, m_birth, m_gender, m_email, m_phone, m_pw, m_availabled from member_tbl
where m_availabled = '1'
where m_availabled = '-1' or m_availabled = '0'
order by m_Number desc ) list )

select * from(select rownum as recNum, list.* from (select m.m_number, m.m_id, m.m_name, TO_CHAR(to_date(m.m_birth,'YY/MM/DD'),'YY.MM.DD') as m_birth, m.m_email, m.m_phone, m.m_date, m.m_availabled, b.reservedNum, (case m.m_gender when 'm' then '남성' else '여성' end) as m_gender from member_tbl m left join (select m_id, count(*) as reservedNum from booking_tbl where b_status ='예약완료' group by m_id) b on m.m_id = b.m_id
where m.m_availabled = '1'
where m.m_availabled = '-1' or m.m_availabled = '0'
order by m.m_number asc ) list) where recNum between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10
select m_gender, count(*) as st_count from member_tbl where m_availabled = '1' group by m_gender

select substr(st_month,3) as st_month, m_gender, count(*) st_count from ( select to_char(m_date, 'YYMM') as st_month, m_gender from member_tbl where m_availabled = '1') where st_month like '21%' group by st_month, m_gender
